Not know what to get that sci-fi/fantasy/horror lover in your life? How about books that the greats of their genre adored & emulated? These are the deep cuts worth a read...

David Lindsay's "A Voyage to Arcturus": both Tolkien and C.S. Lewis loved this book. So much so that it inspired Lewis to write his Space trilogy.

Hugo Gernsback's "Ralph 124C 41+": this pulp classic from the 1920's foretold many technologies, including the internet. He was such a pioneer that the Hugo award is named after him.

Jack London's "Before Adam": the prolific London even dabbled in speculative fiction; in this case, he gives us a sketch of early Man before civilization. This is an underated and imaginative classic.

Francis Stevens "The Nightmares & Other Tales": before there was Shirley Jackson, there was Francis Stevens. Lovecraft loved her stories. An american pioneer of horror and fantasy?--yes please!
Here’s a few last minute gift ideas!  #music #vinylcollection #vinyl #stjohnspdx #local #localbusiness #locallove

“Power that isn’t really justified by the will of the governed should be dismantled.” -quote from Chomsky, On anarchism. 
One of my favorite books!
Happy Birthday to the Noble Noam Chomsky!  #noamchomsky #onanarchism #powertothepeople #fightthepower #readafuckingbook #readbannedbooks #bookstagram #books #revolution #revolutionaryreader #stjohnspdx
Here are a few thought provoking books!  #read #readersofinstagram #bookstagram #strangedays #stjohnspdx #thinking #think

"Without music life would be a mistake." Books about music are essential too.  We are fortunate here in PDX because local author's bring in great books they have written about music, like @blind_bartimaeus (aka Santi Elijah Holley), who brought us some of these great 33 1/3 books about Nick Cave's "Murder Ballads." It's not just a reflection on Cave's album but is a bloody, meandering meditation on the evolution of murder ballads in general. 
We are also including some other great music titles in this post, all of which have ties to Portland in some way.
#musicrock #musicsoothesthesoul #booksaboutmusic #rockbooks #murderballads #nickcave #nickcaveandthebadseeds #musiclover #musiclovers #harrypartch #thebirthdayparty #nickthestripper #localauthor #localmusic #localwriter #stjohnspdx

The @sol_bowl_pnw is back and as delicious as ever! The pictures don’t do this Mezze platter justice! Stuffed grape leaves, Spanakopita, Two kebabs, chicken Shawarma, grilled zucchini and eggplant served on top of kale. fresh warm pita bread served with Baba ghanouj, hummus and tahini and Ending with fresh baklava for dessert. This fed three!  #food #foodporn #foodie #foodiesofinstagram #eat #eatlocal #stjohnspdx

Buying local means buying from local folks this holiday. @jordansweiss dropped these amazing mushroom- hunter calenders off for us to sell, and we couldn't be more psyched--filled with lush photos (by the author!), great descriptions and guidance, as well as attention to specials days ignored on other calendars, these are a great addition to any home, or a awesome gift to the fungi-lover in your life.
(PS--@jordansweiss is smiling behind that mask!)
#buylocal #buylocalauthors #mushroomhunters #mushroomsrock #mushrooms #mushroomcalender #thefungusamongus #micology #micologists #fungi #fungiphotography #mushroomphotograph #fungiphotography #localbookstore #localbookshop #buylocal
